name: MAGICAL×SPIRAL
description: Medianne Phirtia, a student residing in the region of Midgard. She has long held an admiration for 'Celestria' — a place spoken of in fairy tales where users of magic reside.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
